post.body: I think it is dumb. haha!
Interesting... Is there an explanation on the site? I skipped through them all. Haha!
With that said it is the journey that counts. Success is just a reward. If you take success too seriously it becomes a fear.
it can be applied in anything you do. It is not about bring about success but the difference that counts.
No problem dude.
I am honored! just curious... What's your score?
Any plans for countdown to 2009?
Will do mate! There is so much to do in life than laying in bed all day trying to get better.
Hi Judy, I am still waiting for your complimentary ebook that you want my opinion on. Cheers!
I am down with a small Asthma attack, cough and flu. It is a killer.

Anyone joining me for countdown @ Marine Barrage. Food @ old market and then we buy some munchies and drinks. We go straight after dinner.
Rendy is recovering but still feel like a train rack.
I believe that every little difference no matter how small adds up. Start making a difference today!
Feeling bad today. Bad cough! It is a nice day in Singapore though.
